message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $900,000 is a significant drop from my initial asking price.  To find a middle ground, I'd be willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $1,100,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $950,000. I'm confident that's a fair price for this product.
